opis: Podstrana, vila s bazenom i pogledom na more Posredujemo u prodaji urbane vile s bazenom i pogledom na more. Na zemljištu od 600 m2, a stambeni dio vile iznosi 320 m2, položen kroz tri etaže. U podrumu vile je  prostor za rekreaciju, fitness/sauna i garaža. Na etaži prizemlja će biti veliki dnevni dio otvorenog koncepta (dnevni boravak, blagovaonica i kuhinja), jedna spavaća soba, kupaonica, WC i stubište. Na prvom katu će se nalaziti 3 sobe, svaka sa svojom kupaonicom. Velika, uređena okućnica s bazenom i parkingom, zaokružuje izgled vile. Pogled na more je još jedan adut za kupnju ove nekretnine. Udaljena je od Splita 10 km a od međunarodne zračne luke svega 30 km. Sve potrebno za život ili bavljenje turizmom, nalazi se u blizini. Sve informacije o nekretnini kao i razgledavanje iste moguće je isključivo uz potpisivanje Ugovora o posredovanju koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane uz kupoprodaju nekretnine, a sve u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka, te Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju od postignute kupoprodajne cijene. Za sve informacije zvati na broj 091 937 3688 Ivana ili na i.fadic@remax.hr **************************************************** Podstrana, villa under construction with pool and sea view We mediate the sale of an urban villa under construction, with a swimming pool and a view of the sea. The villa can be purchased on a turnkey basis for the specified price. It is built on a plot of land of 600 m2, and the residential part of the villa is 320 m2, spread over three floors. In the basement of the villa, there is a space for recreation, a fitness/sauna and a garage. On the ground floor there will be a large open-concept living area (living room, dining room and kitchen), one bedroom, bathroom, toilet and staircase. On the first floor there will be 3 rooms, each with its own bathroom. A large, landscaped garden with a swimming pool and parking will complete the appearance of the villa. The sea view is another asset for buying this property. It is 10 km from Split and only 30 km from the international airport. Everything you need for life or tourism is nearby. All information about the property, as well as viewing it, is possible only with the signing of the Brokerage Agreement, which is the basis for further actions related to the purchase and sale of the property, and all in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. The buyer pays the agency commission from the achieved purchase price. For all information, call Ivana at 091 937 3688 or at i.fadic@remax.hr
